```js title=main.js

(await __webpack_async_dependencies__)() : __webpack_async_dependencies__);// Test file for default allowedUris behavior (no allowedUris specified)
// When no allowedUris are specified, all URLs should be allowed by default




// Test all three modules should load successfully when no allowedUris are specified
it("should load all modules when no allowedUris are specified (allowed module)", () => {
  expect(http_localhost_8999_allowed_module_js__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__["default"]).toBe("This module is from an allowed URI");
});

it("should load all modules when no allowedUris are specified (regex module)", () => {
  expect(http_localhost_8999_regex_module_js__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__["default"]).toBe("This module is from a regex-matched URI");
});

it("should load all modules when no allowedUris are specified (restricted module)", () => {
  // With no allowedUris, even the "restricted" module should load
  expect(http_localhost_8999_restricted_module_js__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_2__["default"]).toBe("This module is from a restricted URI");
});

// Export results for validation in other tests if needed
module.exports = {
  allowedModuleLoaded: typeof http_localhost_8999_allowed_module_js__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__["default"] === "string",
  regexModuleLoaded: typeof http_localhost_8999_regex_module_js__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__["default"] === "string",
  restrictedModuleLoaded: typeof http_localhost_8999_restricted_module_js__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_2__["default"] === "string"
};
```
